Verses: 1 karththaave, Engalukku Nerittadhai Ninaiththarulum; Engal Nindhaiyai Nokkippaarum.
2 engal Sudhandharam Anniyar Vasamaagavum, Engal Veedugal Puraththesaththaarvasamaagavum Thaandippoyina.
3 thikkatravargalaanom, Thagappan Illai; Engal Thaaigal Vidhavaigalaippola Irukkiraargal.
4 engal Thanneeraip Panaththukku Vaangik Kudikkirom; Engal Viragu Vilaikkirayamaai Varugiradhu.
5 paaranchumandhu Engal Kazhuththu Nogiradhu; Naangal Uzhaikkirom, Engalukku Ilaippaarudhal Illai.
6 appaththaal Thirupthiyaagumpadi Egipthiyarukkum Aseeriyarukkum Engalaik Kaiyaliththom.
7 engal Pidhaakkal Paavancheydhu Maanduponaargal; Naangal Avargaludaiya Akkiramangalai Sumakkirom.
8 adimaigal Engalai Aalugiraargal; Engalai Avargal Kaiyilirundhu Viduvippaarillai.
9 vanaandharaththil Irukkira Pattayaththinaal Praanamosaththukku Edhuvaanavargalaai Engal Appaththaith Thedugirom.
10 panjaththin Kodumaiyinaal Engal Thol Aduppangaraiyaippol Karuththuppoyitru.
11 seeyonil Irundha Sthreegalaiyum Yoodhaa Pattanangalil Irundha Kannigaigalaiyum Avamaanappaduththinaargal.
12 prabukkaludaiya Kaigalai Avargal Katti, Avargalai Eraththookkinaargal; Mudhiyorin Mugangal Madhikkappadavillai.
13 vaalibarai Endhiram Araikkak Konduponaargal; Ilaignar Viragu Sumandhu Idarivizhugiraargal.
14 mudhiyorgal Vaasalgalil Utkaarugiradhum, Vaalibar Kinnarangalai Vaasikkiradhum Nindrupoyitru.
15 engal Irudhayaththin Kalikoorudhal Ozhindhupoyitru; Engal Sandhosham Dhukkamaai Maaritru.
16 engal Thalaiyilirundhu Kreedam Vizhundhadhu; Aiyo! Naangal Paavancheydhome.
17 adhinaal Engal Irudhayam Balatchayamaayitru; Adhinaal Engal Kangal Irundupoyina.
18 paazhaaikkidakkira Seeyon Malaiyinmel Narigal Odiththirigiradhu.
19 karththaave, Neer Endrendraikkum Irukkireer; Ummudaiya Singaasanam Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Nilainirkum.
20 dhevareer Endraikkum Engalai Marandhu, Nedunkaalamaaga Engalaik Kaivittiruppadhenna?
21 karththaave, Engalai Ummidaththil Thiruppikkollum, Appozhudhu Thirumbuvom; Poorvakaalaththilirundhadhu Pola Engal Naatkalaip Pudhiyavaigalaakkum.
22 engalai Mutrilum Veruththuviduveero? Engalperil Kadunkobamaayirukkireere!
